en.heading: AboutÂ me
en.introduction: Hi! I'm Alex, aÂ web-developer fromÂ StockholmÂ ğŸ‘‹
en.projects: IÂ help clients turn ideas intoÂ websites andÂ applications andÂ help get their projects upÂ andÂ running onÂ time. IÂ write code andÂ manage developer teams, maintain andÂ develop companies' products andÂ myÂ ownÂ projects.
en.blogging: IÂ collect experience inÂ myÂ blog andÂ write about theÂ process andÂ results ofÂ myÂ work. IÂ explain various technical problems andÂ their possible solutions withÂ attention toÂ architecture andÂ code extensibility. InÂ addition toÂ development, IÂ write about design, management, andÂ books I've read.
en.teaching: IÂ teach people software development, give lectures andÂ public talks. IÂ also mentor junior developers andÂ help beginners toÂ master modern development.
